meanings.definition: A person who designs, builds, or researches robots.
meanings.sent1: The roboticists at the university are creating a new robot for the competition.
meanings.sent2: Many roboticists work in teams to develop advanced robotic technologies.
meanings.sent3: The roboticists accidentally programmed the robot to dance instead of walk!
meanings.sent4: In the world of robotics, the roboticists are the architects of the future.
meanings.sent5: The young roboticists were inspired by the possibilities of artificial intelligence.

meanings.definition: The field of study or practice of designing, building, or researching robots.
meanings.sent1: Robotics is a fascinating field that attracts many aspiring roboticists.
meanings.sent2: The conference on robotics brought together experts and roboticists from around the world.
meanings.sent3: The roboticists in training were excited to start their first project in robotics class.
meanings.sent4: In the realm of technology, roboticists play a crucial role in innovation.
meanings.sent5: The roboticists' lab was filled with the hum of machines and the buzz of creativity.
